summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 3.7°C) and feels like temperature (down 3.3°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 22%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 18426 lux), cloud levels (up 715 m), and pressure (up 7 mbar).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 16563 lux), the amount of wind (up 21 miles), and cloud levels (up 403 m) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, humidity should not be a concern and gentle light winds are expected. Possible light showers, the sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds, and overcast conditions will limit sunlight. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
